description: At Sovereign Tech, I design and build web apps to support business growth. I work with teams to turn designs into responsive, accessible products, focusing on performance and user experience. I led feature development that improved productivity and aligned user needs with business goals.

Developed fullstack apps, contributed to open-source, completed a remote engineering program, and collaborated globally on real-world projects. Led sprints, assigned tasks, and resolved blockers through teamwork.
Mentored aspiring frontend developers, guiding them through projects, code reviews, and essential concepts. Helped mentees build skills and confidence for real-world development.
